T02D1561:216b-1: khe tsa ra rakta badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha nam /
T02D1561:216b-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mkha' spyod ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1561:216b-4: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1561:216b-5: re zhig dur khrod la sogs par zhal bzhi pa'i sngags kyis bsrung ba byas nas /
T02D1561:216b-6: ae'i chos 'byung dbus su padma dang zla ba la /
T02D1561:216b-7: ma ning gi sa bon spun pa med pa bltas te /
T02D1561:216b-8: sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1561:216b-9: zhabs steng du bskyod cing gyen du gzigs pa /
T02D1561:216b-10: g-yas na rdo rje kha cung zad gyes pa /
T02D1561:217a-0: g-yon pa'i phyag gis brla la 'khyud cing @217a * //
T02D1561:217a-1: thod pa me tog phreng ba dang bcas pa bskal ba'i me ltar dmar ba /
T02D1561:217a-5: seng ge'i stang stabs kyis bzhud cing /
T02D1561:217a-6: rdo rje mnyes byed ma ni bsgom par bya /
T02D1561:217a-9: pa ri dza ta ga yis yongs su 'phags pa /
T02D1561:217a-10: rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs par bzhud cing rab tu 'jug pa lta bu /
T02D1561:217a-11: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dmar mo zhabs g-yon pa steng du bskyod pa /
T02D1561:217a-12: rang bzhin gyis ye shes sems dpa'i bdag nyid bsam par bya //
T02D1561:217a-13: sindhu ra dmar po'i 'od zer can slar yang spros zhing bsdu ba sngon du song bas /
T02D1561:217a-14: de nas lte bar chos 'byung nang du /
T02D1561:217a-15: ye shes kyi rang bzhin n'a da dang /
T02D1561:217a-16: rim gyis skra rtse brgya dang /
T02D1561:217a-17: stong gi cha ru ma dmigs te /
T02D1561:217a-18: rnal 'byor rlung ni bcu gnyis 'gag / don chen 'grub par the tshom med //
T02D1561:217a-19: aom sh'ri he ru ka ma h'a badzra a'a karsha ya /
T02D1561:217a-20: pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
T02D1561:217a-22: sarba buddha d'a ki n'i nam hri yam aom a'a: h'um phat /
T02D1561:217a-23: rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang ngag gi bzlas pa'o //
T02D1561:217a-24: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye pra t'i tstshe
T02D1561:217a-25: mam ba lim aom a'a: h'um h'um h'um ha ha
T02D1561:217a-26: hi: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri
T02D1561:217a-27: shya ho / lan gsum brjod pas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1561:217a-28: de la mkha' 'gro mas dge ba'i mtshan ma ston cing dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1561:217a-29: rnal 'byor ma drug gi sngags kyi bdag nyid kyang
T02D1561:217a-30: go cha bgo zhing rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das
T02D1561:217a-31: ma'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D1561:217a-32: grub thob rngon pa'i zhal snga nas kyi rim pa mkha' spyod ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D1561:217a-34: // / bla ma rdo rje gdan pa ni shka lingga'i zhal snga nas /
